website_summaries.verdict: A fun bundle with braid stamps for Disney princess fans who love the idea of styling hair. Value pack with stamps and four tubs of Play-Doh.
pros: In addition to stamps for hair and braids, there are templates to create accessories
Cute Pascal wheel stamp is sturdy for plenty of use
Bust of Rapunzel is small enough to pack for travel
Play-Doh has sparkle compound for extra pizzazz
cons: Set is much smaller than expected, and hair doesn’t “grow” as long as one might hope

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's third birthday. In the past, I have hated buying Play-doh sets because some are so hard to clean. But this looked really cute so I took a chance. Anyway, the toy has already provided hours of fun for my daughter (and myself). The part that you fill with Play-doh to make the hair come out is super easy to clean and my daughter loves to cut and brush the hair that comes out. You can also make braids with the Pascal piece and the inside of the hair brush. FYI: A bobby pin will remove Play-doh stuck in the brush with no problem. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: ultrabliss10

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Over all my 4 year old loved it, but was disappointed that the press doesn't hold a ton of Doh and you can't get her hair long enough. The rolling braid maker is cool especially since my 4 yo likes to make "fancy styles," but is too young to braid yet.
customer_reviews.author: mollitachiquita

customer_reviews.title: All the advertising made it looked more fun than it is in the commercials
customer_reviews.text: All the advertising made it looked more fun than it is in the commercials.. It is typically like every other play doh. Serv es the purpose but I was a little disappointed that requires so much work to do what the commercial indicates it does..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy for young children
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my granddaughter's third birthday. She immediately started playing with it after she opened it, and our four year old grandson loved it too. Great gift for young kids! I'd read a few reviews about there not being enough play dough, but if that's true my granddaughter didn't realize it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it seemed silly to me but my granddaughter asked for it so.... Any way, she loves it. It holds her attention for hours and she makes such creatives things with it. She begs to come over and play with it and it's all she can talk about.
customer_reviews.author: Witchystitcher

customer_reviews.title: Looks easy to do on video or commerical.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is unique and neat for any Rapunzel lover. However, it was difficult for my daughter to use. Play-Doh does get stuck around the sides (not where the Play-Doh goes). It clicks loud, like if it's broke. The handle to move to make the Play-Doh go up is tough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year-old granddaughter. It was easy for her to use and she loves it. It kept her attention for longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: katsee214

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: This looked much cooler on TV. The accessories are actually really nice and detailed, but the overall Rapunzel is very small. I was not overly impressed, they need to increase her size by about double and then it would be a slam dunk.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for granddaughter and it very disappointing. Hard to clean and frustrated her. Does not work as easily as pictured in ads.
customer_reviews.author: Vera H Davis

customer_reviews.title: Hair is short!
customer_reviews.text: You know how hotel rooms look way bigger in photos than in reality? That’s how this doll’s hair is... it comes to maybe chin length and braiding “hair” that short is impossible for a 3 year old. They long braids that are advertised are the work of an adult doing it separately and cannot remotely be accomplished with this mechanism. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it and I couldn’t find It anywhere else at the time(Christmas). Price was good. Easy to use for. 4 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Kept her busy for a while
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoys this. For a 3 year old, this was a great gift. Making hair for Rupunzel kept her busy for 2 hours. Which is a lot for her.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2-3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a little girl with cerebral palsy. It broke after 2-3 uses. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing with this. She cuts the hair, puts on the hair decoration, etc. It keeps us occupied for a long time, as I play it with her. Quality time!

Easier to load with play doh and easy to clean. More durbable than I thought it would be. You will definitely get many hours of playtime with this.

Nice to not have to dig dry pieces out each time. Even with the main hair tube full of Doh, it is pretty easy to crank.

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Royal Salon Featuring Disney Princess Rapunzel
product_meta.description:
Get creative and give Rapunzel some hair flair at the Royal Salon! With the styling head, tools, and 4 cans of Play-Doh compound, there are so many fun hairstyles to try again and again. To start, simply add a Play-Doh color to the styling head and crank the lever to grow her hair. Now it's time to style! The brush doubles as a mold for colorful curls, and Pascal rolls long braids. Create bows, flowers, and other accessories at the base of the styling head and use the comb and scissors for even more customization. Try adding some shimmer with the included sparkle compound!

Hasbro, Play-Doh, and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
Copyright Disney.
feature_bullets: Create fun Play-Doh hairstyles for Rapunzel with the styling head
Add Play-Doh compound and crank the lever to grow hair
Make curls with the brush mold and the molds on the styling head base
Roll braids with Pascal and add accessories like flowers and bows
Includes Rapunzel styling head, Pascal braid roller, brush book-mold, scissors, comb, and 4 cans of Play-Doh Brand Modeling Compound (8 ounces total)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars301 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
